sn55.2:1: "Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.2:2: Katamehi catūhi? Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti. Dhamme … pe … saṅghe … pe … ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.2:3: Idamavoca bhagavā. Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn55.2:4: "Yesaṁ saddhā ca sīlañca,Pasādo dhammadassanaṁ;Te ve kālena paccenti,Brahmacariyogadhaṁ sukhan"ti.
